thread.title: “The Wiz” at Blair Hall Theatre of Sinclair Community College
thread.title_full: “The Wiz” at Blair Hall Theatre of Sinclair Community College | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Russell Florence Jr.
title: “The Wiz” at Blair Hall Theatre of Sinclair Community College
text:
​Composer Charlie Smalls and librettist William P. Brown’s Tony Award-winning 1975 musical “The Wiz” launches Sinclair Community College’s 2015-16 season beginning Friday, Oct. 9 in Blair Hall Theatre.
Based on L. Frank Baum’s classic novel “The Wonderful Wizard of Oz,” “The Wiz” reintroduces many familiar characters from the Oz story within a distinctively soulful context. Dorothy, Scarecrow, Tin Man, and the Cowardly Lion’s eye-opening journey to meet the mysterious Wizard is accented by the kooky Addaperle, the Good Witch of the North, and the larger-than-life Evillene, the Wicked Witch of the West daring anyone to bring her bad news. Smalls’ terrifically flavorful score includes “Ease on Down the Road,” “He’s the Wizard,” “Be a Lion,” “What Would I Do If I Could Feel,” and “Home.”
Continue reading on MyDaytonDailyNews.com. »
